Dear Shagan,

 

Thank you for the notification.

 

We have registered the claim under the reference 23/MO/18025.

 

Please provide the following documents for our review:

 

*	Copy of shipment declaration details (month and list) provided to our underwriting team.
*	MAWB (shared is the HAWB) 
*	Proof of delivery, Claused by both parties. 
*	Damage report from the carrier, as of wet damage.
*	LOR to the carrier, holding them responsible for the damage during transit.
*	Customs bill of entry.
*	Additional photographs, being the claim for 42 units of damage. 
*	Also, please check and revert, whether the items can be repacked, if so, please advise repacking cos and if not, any offer for the salvage.

 

We look forward to hearing from you.

 

Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive. Issued on “without prejudice” basis.

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Rasheed Mohammed

Non Motor Claims Executive (Property & Casualty)

Dear Shagan,

 

Thank you for the notification.

 

We have registered the claim under the reference 23/MO/18025.

 

Please provide the following documents for our review:

 

*	Copy of shipment declaration details (month and list) provided to our underwriting team.
*	MAWB (shared is the HAWB) 
*	Proof of delivery, Claused by both parties. 
*	Damage report from the carrier, as of wet damage.
*	LOR to the carrier, holding them responsible for the damage during transit.
*	Customs bill of entry.
*	Additional photographs, being the claim for 42 units of damage. 
*	Also, please check and revert, whether the items can be repacked, if so, please advise repacking cos and if not, any offer for the salvage.

 

We look forward to hearing from you.

 

Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive. Issued on “without prejudice” basis.

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Rasheed Mohammed

Dear Shagan,

 

Thank you for the notification.

 

We have registered the claim under the reference 23/MO/18025.

 

Please provide the following documents for our review:

 

*	Copy of shipment declaration details (month and list) provided to our underwriting team.
*	MAWB (shared is the HAWB) 
*	Proof of delivery, Claused by both parties. 
*	Damage report from the carrier, as of wet damage.
*	LOR to the carrier, holding them responsible for the damage during transit.
*	Customs bill of entry.
*	Additional photographs, being the claim for 42 units of damage. 
*	Also, please check and revert, whether the items can be repacked, if so, please advise repacking cos and if not, any offer for the salvage.

 

We look forward to hearing from you.

 

Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive. Issued on “without prejudice” basis.

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Rasheed Mohammed

تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

PUBLIC

 

Dear Shagan,

 

Thank you for the notification.

 

We have registered the claim under the reference 23/MO/18025.

 

Please provide the following documents for our review:

 

*	Copy of shipment declaration details (month and list) provided to our underwriting team.
*	MAWB (shared is the HAWB)
*	Proof of delivery, Claused by both parties.
*	Damage report from the carrier, as of wet damage.
*	LOR to the carrier, holding them responsible for the damage during transit.
*	Customs bill of entry.
*	Additional photographs, being the claim for 42 units of damage.
*	Also, please check and revert, whether the items can be repacked, if so, please advise repacking cos and if not, any offer for the salvage.

 

We look forward to hearing from you.

 

Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive. Issued on “without prejudice” basis.

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Rasheed Mohammed

Non Motor Claims Executive (Property & Casualty)

Tel: (+971) 4 440 3792

P.O. Box 32505, Dubai – United Arab Emirates

www.gig-gulf.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/mGfaCqMy4TGG8K2HXhqiEMdKB?domain=gig-gulf.com/>

PUBLIC

 

Dear Shagan,

 

Thank you for the notification.

 

We have registered the claim under the reference 23/MO/18025.

 

Please provide the following documents for our review:

 

*	Copy of shipment declaration details (month and list) provided to our underwriting team.
*	MAWB (shared is the HAWB)
*	Proof of delivery, Claused by both parties.
*	Damage report from the carrier, as of wet damage.
*	LOR to the carrier, holding them responsible for the damage during transit.
*	Customs bill of entry.
*	Additional photographs, being the claim for 42 units of damage.
*	Also, please check and revert, whether the items can be repacked, if so, please advise repacking cos and if not, any offer for the salvage.

 

We look forward to hearing from you.

 

Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive. Issued on “without prejudice” basis.

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Rasheed Mohammed

Non Motor Claims Executive (Property & Casualty)

Tel: (+971) 4 440 3792

P.O. Box 32505, Dubai – United Arab Emirates
